Package com.flightbookings.flight_bookings.controllers

Class FlightController

java.lang.Object
com.flightbookings.flight_bookings.controllers.FlightController
@CrossOrigin("*") @RestController @RequestMapping("api/v1/flight") public class FlightController extends Object

  • Constructor Details

      public FlightController(FlightService flightService, FlightConverter flightConverter)

  • Method Details

    • createFlight

      @PostMapping(value="/create", consumes="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<FlightDTO> createFlight(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid FlightDTO flightDTO)
      Creates a new flight in the system. This endpoint allows clients to create a new flight by providing its details encapsulated in a FlightDTO object.
      Parameters:
      flightDTO - the details of the flight to be created
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the created FlightDTO and an HTTP status of 201 (Created)

    • getFlightById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<FlightDTO> getFlightById(@PathVariable Long id)
      Retrieves a flight by its ID. This endpoint allows clients to fetch the details of a specific flight using its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the flight to be retrieved
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the FlightDTO if found, otherwise an HTTP status of 404 (Not Found)

    • getAllFlights

      @GetMapping("/") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<FlightDTO>> getAllFlights()
      Retrieves all flights from the system. This endpoint fetches a list of all flights currently available in the system.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing a list of FlightDTOs and an HTTP status of 200 (OK)

    • updateFlight

      @PutMapping("/update/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<FlightDTO> updateFlight(@PathVariable Long id, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid FlightDTO flightDTO)
      Updates the details of an existing flight. This endpoint allows clients to update the information of a specific flight using its ID and the new details provided in a FlightDTO.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the flight to be updated
      flightDTO - the new details for the flight
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the updated FlightDTO if successful, otherwise an HTTP status of 404 (Not Found)

    • deleteFlight

      @DeleteMapping("/delete/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> deleteFlight(@PathVariable Long id)
      Deletes a flight by its ID. This endpoint allows clients to remove a specific flight from the system using its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the flight to be deleted
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with HTTP status of 204 (No Content) if deletion is successful, otherwise an HTTP status of 404 (Not Found)

    • cancelFlight

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}/cancel") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> cancelFlight(@PathVariable Long id)
      Cancels a flight by its ID. This endpoint allows clients to cancel a specific flight using its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the flight to be canceled
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with a message indicating the flight has been canceled successfully

    • delayFlight

      @PostMapping("/{id}/delay") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> delayFlight(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestParam String newDepartureTime)
      Delays a flight by its ID. This endpoint allows clients to delay a specific flight by providing a new departure time.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the flight to be delayed
      newDepartureTime - the new departure time in ISO-8601 format
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with a message indicating the flight has been delayed successfully

    • updateAvailability

      @PostMapping("/updateAvailability") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> updateAvailability()
      Updates the availability of all flights. This endpoint allows clients to update the availability status of all flights.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with a message indicating the flight availability has been updated successfully

    • getFlightsByAirplaneType

      @GetMapping("/byAirplaneType") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<FlightDTO>> getFlightsByAirplaneType(@RequestParam EFlightAirplane airplaneType)
      Retrieves flights filtered by airplane type. This endpoint allows clients to fetch a list of flights filtered by the specified airplane type.
      Parameters:
      airplaneType - the type of airplane to filter flights
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing a list of FlightDTOs filtered by airplane type and an HTTP status of 200 (OK)
